articles.title: Mosquito-inspired drone sensor could prevent collisions - DroneDJ
articles.description: After studying how mosquitos avoid obstacles in the dark, researchers developed a sensor that can help drones navigate clear of collisions in the same way.
articles.content:
Drones are nimble and fast-movingsometimes too fast for the obstacles they encounter. There has been a trend of adding more and more collision sensors to drones to help them sense and avoid obstacles. But sensors cost money and consume power and space. 
Now … [+1958 chars]
